scripts.database:run-container: podman run --name local_db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=admin -e POSTGRES_USER=admin -e POSTGRES_DB=postgres_db -p 5432:5432 -d postgres
scripts.container-pgadmin: podman run --name postgres_admin -e PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL=admin@admin.fr -e PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD=admin -p 80:80 -p 5433:5432 -d dpage/pgadmin4
